00051 //******************** TENTACLE::TENTACLETRAVERSER ***********************//
00055 TentTrav::TentacleTraverser(Tentacle& tentacle)
00056 {
00057         //If we have a normal set of points, initialize as normal
00058         if(tentacle.points_.size() > 1)
00059         {
00060                 this->start_            = tentacle.points_.begin();
00061                 this->end_              = tentacle.points_.end();
00062                 this->last_point_       = &tentacle.points_.at(0);
00063                 this->next_point_       = &tentacle.points_.at(0);
00064                 this->length_   = 0;
00065                 this->delta_length_ = 0;
00066                 this->empty_            = false;
00067         }
00068         //If we only got a single point, still initialize the point values, but set empty true
00069         else if(tentacle.points_.size() == 1){
00070                 this->start_            = tentacle.points_.begin();
00071                 this->end_              = tentacle.points_.end();
00072                 this->last_point_ = &tentacle.points_.at(0);
00073                 this->next_point_ = &tentacle.points_.at(0);
00074                 this->empty_    = true;
00075         }
00076         //If we got a completely empty vector, set empty true, do not initialize point values
00077         else {
00078                 this->empty_ = true;
00079                 this->next_point_ = NULL;
00080                 this->last_point_ = NULL;
00081         }
00082 }
00083 
00087 TentTrav::TentacleTraverser(const Tentacle& tentacle)
00088 {
00089         //If we have a normal set of points, initialize as normal

00095                 this->length_   = 0;
00096                 this->delta_length_ = 0;
00097                 this->empty_            = false;
00098         }
00099         //If we only got a single point, still initialize the point values, but set empty true
00100         else if(tentacle.points_.size() == 1){
00101                 this->start_            = tentacle.points_.begin();
00102                 this->end_              = tentacle.points_.end();
00103                 this->last_point_ = &tentacle.points_.at(0);
00104                 this->next_point_ = &tentacle.points_.at(0);
00105                 this->empty_    = true;
00106         }
00107         //If we got a completely empty vector, set empty true, do not initialize point values
00108         else {
00109                 this->empty_ = true;
00110                 this->next_point_ = NULL;
00111                 this->last_point_ = NULL;
00112         }
00113 }

00119 bool TentTrav::hasNext() const
00120 {
00121         return !this->empty_;
00122 }
00123 
00131 const oryx_path_planning::Point& TentTrav::next()
00132 {
00133         //If they're not equal, and we're not empty, we're already in the traversal, process the next point
00134         if((this->next_point_ != this->last_point_)&&!this->empty_)
00135         {
00136                 //Update the calculated length along the Tentacle we've traversed
00137                 Eigen::Vector4f lastPM(this->last_point_->getVector4fMap());
00138                 Eigen::Vector4f nextPM(this->next_point_->getVector4fMap());
00139                 this->delta_length_ = pcl::distances::l2(lastPM, nextPM);
00140                 this->length_ += this->delta_length_;
00141 
00142                 //Set lastPoint to nextPoint so that nextPoint can be updated if possible
00143                 this->last_point_ = this->next_point_;
00144 
00145                 //Increment the traversal and check for end
00146                 this->start_++;
00147                 if(this->start_>= this->end_)
00148                 {
00149                         this->empty_ = true;
00150                 }
00151                 //Otherwise update nextPoint
00152                 else
00153                 {
00154                         this->next_point_ = &*this->start_;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 //Return lastPoint, which was nextPoint when this method was originally called unless the traversal was empty
00158                 return *this->last_point_;
00159         }
00160         //If we're empty, just return lastPoint which will be the final point in the traversal
00161         else if(empty_)
00162         {
00163                 return *this->last_point_;
00164         }
00165         //If they're equal and we're not empty, we haven't started the traversal, so start it
00166         else
00167         {
00168                 if(this->start_ != this->end_)
00169                 {
00170                         this->start_++;
00171                         this->next_point_ = &*this->start_;
00172                 }
00173                 else this->empty_ = true;
00174                 return *this->last_point_;
00175         }
00176 }

00208 Tentacle::Tentacle(double expFact, double seedRad, double seedLength, int index, int numTent, double resolution, int xDim, int yDim, double velocity) throw (TentacleGenerationException):
00209                                                         points_()
00210 {
00211 
00212         this->velocity_= velocity;
00213         PRINTER("Generating Tentacle %d", index);
00214         int halfway_index       = numTent/2;
00215         //Calculate tentacle radius. Formula taken from 'von Hundelshausen et al.: Integral Structures for Sensing and Motion'
00216         if(index<halfway_index)
00217         {
00218                 //Tentacle is to the right of halfway
00219                 this->radius_ = std::pow(expFact,index)*seedRad;
00220         }
00221         else if(index>halfway_index)
00222         {
00223                 //Tentacle is to the left of halfway
00224                 this->radius_ = -std::pow(expFact,index-(halfway_index+1))*seedRad;
00225         }
00226         else
00227         {
00228                 //Tentacle is exactly at halfway
00229                 this->radius_ = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00230         }
00231         PRINTER("Calculated Tentacle Radius=%f", this->radius_);
00232         //Calculate the working length of the tentacle
00233         int working_length;
00234 
00235         if(index<halfway_index)
00236         {
00237                 //ROS_INFO("Small Index %d, raw working length is %f",index, seedLength+2*std::sqrt((double)index/(double)halfwayIndex));
00238                 working_length = roundToGrid(seedLength+2*std::sqrt((double)index/(double)halfway_index), resolution);
00239         }
00240         else{
00241                 //ROS_INFO("Large Index %d, raw working length is %f",index, seedLength+2*std::sqrt(((double)index-(double)halfwayIndex)/(double)halfwayIndex));
00242                 working_length = roundToGrid(seedLength+2*std::sqrt(((double)index-(double)halfway_index)/(double)halfway_index), resolution);
00243         }
00244 
00245         //Check for special case of an effectively straight line
00246         if(this->radius_ > this->straight_threshold_ || this->radius_ < -this->straight_threshold_)
00247         {
00248                 this->radius_ = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00249                 for(double i = 0; i<working_length; i++)
00250                 {
00251                         oryx_path_planning::Point coord;
00252                         coord.x=i;
00253                         coord.y=0;
00254                         coord.z=0;
00255                         this->points_.push_back(coord);
00256                 }
00257         }
00258         else
00259         {
00260                 //Convert the radius, which will be in engineering units, into grid coordinates
00261                 int working_radius = roundToGrid(radius_, resolution);
00262                 //Calculate the sweep angle for this tentacle
00263                 double sweep_angle = std::abs((double)working_length/(double)working_radius);
00264                 //ROS_INFO("Tentacle %d, Working Length %d, Working Radius %d, Sweep Angle %f", index, working_length, working_radius, sweep_angle);
00265                 //              //Place the origin of the tentacle, which will be at x=0 and y=-workingRadius
00266                 //              Point tentacleOrigin;
00267                 //              tentacleOrigin.x = 0;
00268                 //              tentacleOrigin.y = -workingRadius;
00269                 //              tentacleOrigin.z = 0;
00270                 //              tentacleOrigin.rgba = oryx_path_planning::TENTACLE;
00271                 //
00272                 //              workingRadius = std::abs(workingRadius);
00273                 //              if(this->radius>0){
00274                 //                      castArc(workingRadius, sweepAngle, oryx_path_planning::TENTACLE, tentacleOrigin, this->points);
00275                 //              }
00276                 //              else{
00277                 //                      castArc(workingRadius, sweepAngle, oryx_path_planning::TENTACLE, tentacleOrigin, this->points, 3);
00278                 //              }
00279                 //      }
00280                 //      else{
00281                 //Tracks the last coordinate so that we don't get duplicates
00282                 oryx_path_planning::Point last_coord;
00283                 last_coord.x = 0;
00284                 last_coord.y = 0;
00285                 last_coord.z = 0;
00286                 //The amount to increment theta by
00287                 double theta_increment  = oryx_path_planning::constants::PI()/((100.0/resolution)*std::abs(this->radius_));
00288                 //Push the first coordinate on
00289                 this->points_.push_back(last_coord);
00290                 //Calculate the X and Y coord along the tentacle
00291                 if(this->radius_>0)
00292                 {
00293                         double start_angle = oryx_path_planning::constants::PI()/2.0;
00294                         for(double t=start_angle; t>(start_angle-sweep_angle); t-=theta_increment)
00295                         {
00296                                 oryx_path_planning::Point new_coord;
00297                                 new_coord.y = (oryx_path_planning::roundToGrid(this->radius_*std::sin(t)-this->radius_, resolution));
00298                                 new_coord.x = (oryx_path_planning::roundToGrid(this->radius_*std::cos(t), resolution));
00299                                 new_coord.z = 0;
00300                                 //If we've hit the top of the occupancy grid, break
00301                                 if(new_coord.x>xDim||std::abs(new_coord.y)>yDim) break;
00302                                 //Otherwise push_back the next point if it's not the same as the previous point
00303                                 if(!((((Eigen::Vector4f)new_coord.getVector4fMap())==(((Eigen::Vector4f)last_coord.getVector4fMap())))||(new_coord.x<0)/*||(std::abs(newCoord.getY()>yDim))*/))
00304                                 {
00305                                         this->points_.push_back(new_coord);
00306                                         last_coord = new_coord;
00307                                 }
00308                         }
00309                 }
00310                 else
00311                 {
00312                         double start_angle = oryx_path_planning::constants::PI()/2.0;
00313                         for(double t=start_angle; t<(start_angle+sweep_angle); t+=theta_increment){
00314                                 oryx_path_planning::Point new_coord;
00315                                 new_coord.y = (float)(oryx_path_planning::roundToGrid(this->radius_*std::sin(t)-radius_, resolution));
00316                                 new_coord.x = (float)(oryx_path_planning::roundToGrid(this->radius_*std::cos(t), resolution));
00317                                 new_coord.z = 0;
00318                                 //If we've hit the top of the occupancy grid, break
00319                                 if(new_coord.x>xDim||std::abs(new_coord.y)>yDim) break;
00320                                 //Otherwise push_back the next point if it's not the same as the previous point
00321                                 if(!((((Eigen::Vector4f)new_coord.getVector4fMap())==(((Eigen::Vector4f)last_coord.getVector4fMap())))||(new_coord.x<0)/*||(std::abs(newCoord.getY()>yDim))*/)){
00322                                         this->points_.push_back(new_coord);
00323                                         last_coord = new_coord;
00324                                 }
00325                         }
00326                 }
00327         }
00328         PRINTER("Calculated a Tentacle with Number of Points=%d",(int)this->points_.size());
00329 }

00393 
00394 SpeedSet::SpeedSet(double expFact, double seedRad, double seedLength, int numTent, double resolution, int xDim, int yDim, double velocity)
00395 {
00396         this->seed_rad_  = seedRad;
00397         this->velocity_ = velocity;
00398         PRINTER("Generating a Speed Set with the Parameters <SRad=%f, Vel=%f, NumTent=%d, expF=%f>", seedRad, velocity, numTent, expFact);
00399         for(int t=0; t<numTent; t++)
00400         {
00401                 this->tentacles_.push_back(Tentacle(expFact, seedRad, seedLength, t, numTent, resolution, xDim, yDim, velocity));
00402         }
00403 }

00422 const Tentacle& SpeedSet::getTentacle(int index)const throw(oryx_path_planning::TentacleAccessException)
00423                                 {
00424         if(index<0||index>(int)getNumTentacle()) throw new oryx_path_planning::TentacleAccessException(index, 0);
00425         try
00426         {
00427                 return this->tentacles_.at(index);
00428         }
00429         catch (std::exception& e)
00430         {
00431                 std::string message("Something went wrong!");
00432                 throw new oryx_path_planning::TentacleAccessException(index, 0, message, e);
00433         }
00434                                 }

00483 TentacleGenerator::TentacleGenerator(double minSpeed, double maxSpeed, int numSpeedSet, int numTentacles, double expFact, double resolution, int xDim, int yDim)
00484 {
00485         this->exp_fact_                 = expFact;
00486         this->num_tentacles_    = numTentacles;
00487         this->num_speed_set_    = numSpeedSet;
00488         PRINTER("Generating Speed Sets...");
00489 
00490         double q = 0;
00491         double vel = 0;
00492         double l = 0;
00493         //Generate the SpeedSets
00494         for(int v=0; v<numSpeedSet; v++)
00495         {
00496                 q = calcQ(v);
00497                 l = calcL(q);
00498                 vel = calcSpeedSetVel(minSpeed, maxSpeed, q);
00499                 PRINTER("Calculated q=%f",q);
00500                 this->speed_sets_.push_back(SpeedSetPtr(new SpeedSet(expFact, calcSeedRad(v, l, q), l, numTentacles, resolution, xDim, yDim, vel)));
00501                 this->velocity_keys_.push_back(vel);
00502         }
00503         PRINTER("Speed Sets Complete!");
00504 }

00513 const Tentacle& TentacleGenerator::getTentacle(int speedSet, int index) const throw (oryx_path_planning::TentacleAccessException, oryx_path_planning::SpeedSetAccessException)
00514                                 {
00515         if(speedSet<0||speedSet>(int)this->speed_sets_.size()) throw new oryx_path_planning::SpeedSetAccessException(speedSet);
00516         if(index<0||index>(int)this->speed_sets_.at(speedSet)->getNumTentacle()) throw new oryx_path_planning::TentacleAccessException(index, speedSet);
00517         try
00518         {
00519                 return this->speed_sets_.at(speedSet)->getTentacle(index);
00520         }
00521         catch(std::exception& e)
00522         {
00523                 std::string message("Something Went Wrong!");
00524                 throw new oryx_path_planning::TentacleAccessException(index, speedSet, message, e);
00525         }
00526                                 }

00528 const SpeedSet& TentacleGenerator::getSpeedSet(int speedSet) const
00529 {
00530         return *this->speed_sets_.at(speedSet);
00531 }
00532 
00536 const SpeedSet& TentacleGenerator::getSpeedSet(double velocity) const
00537 {
00538         double low_speed        = 0;
00539         double high_speed       = 0;
00540         int index                       = 0;
00541         //Iterate across keys looking for closest neighbors
00542         for(std::vector<double>::const_iterator itr = this->velocity_keys_.begin(); itr<this->velocity_keys_.end(); itr++){
00543                 if(velocity>=*itr)
00544                 {
00545                         low_speed = *itr;
00546                         index++;
00547                 }
00548                 else
00549                 {
00550                         high_speed = *itr;
00551                         break;
00552                 }
00553         }
00554         //If the key was between two values, calculate the closest neighbor
00555         if(high_speed!=0)
00556         {
00557                 //If closer to low speed, select that index
00558                 if((velocity-low_speed)>(high_speed-velocity))
00559                 {
00560                         return *this->speed_sets_.at(index);
00561                 }
00562                 else
00563                 {
00564                         return *this->speed_sets_.at(index+1);
00565                 }
00566         }
00567         else return *this->speed_sets_.at(index);
00568 }

00590 double TentacleGenerator::calcL(double q)
00591 {
00592         return  MIN_TENTACLE_LENGTH+EXP_TENTACLE_LENGTH_BASE*std::pow(q, EXP_TENTACLE_LENGTH_FACTOR);
00593 }
00594 
00605 double TentacleGenerator::calcSeedRad(int speedSet, double l, double q) const
00606 {
00607         double dphi = 1.2*oryx_path_planning::constants::PI()/2.0;
00608         PRINTER("Calculated dphi=%f, l=%f",dphi, l);
00609         return l/(dphi*(1-std::pow(q,0.9)));
00610 }
00611 
00620 double TentacleGenerator::calcSpeedSetVel(double minSpeed, double maxSpeed, double q) const
00621 {
00622         return minSpeed+std::pow(q, 1.2)*(maxSpeed-minSpeed);
00623 }
00624 
00628 double TentacleGenerator::calcQ(int speedSet) const
00629 {
00630         return (double)speedSet/((double)this->num_speed_set_-1);
00631 }
